body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling NoteWorthy Music School. My name is Bruce Torres. How can I assist you today?

Hi Bruce, I'm feeling a bit anxious about a billing issue. My name is Janice Baker.

Hello, Janice. It's nice to meet you. I’m here to help, so no need to worry. Could you please provide me with your student ID number?

Sure, it's one two three four five.

Thank you, Janice. Could you also verify your email address with us?

Yes, it's janice.baker at email dot com.

Perfect, Janice. Now, what seems to be the problem with your billing?

I noticed that there seems to be an extra charge in my last billing statement.

I understand your concern. Let me check your account details and get this sorted out for you.

Thank you for your patience, Janice. I found the issue and have resolved it. You will see the adjustment reflected in the next statement.

Thank you so much, Bruce. That really helps ease my mind.

You’re welcome, Janice! Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Bruce Torres from NoteWorthy discusses billing with Janice Baker. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
